oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Muster roll, 47th Tenn. Infantry, CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Muster rolls for Co. H and Co. K, 47th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, dated September 1 - December 31, 1864. Comments give details of soldiers captured, injured, and killed in both companies after the battles of Missionary Ridge, Chickamauga, Franklin, and Nashville.
